column4: And does anyone know where I'd find the command history that might exist if I type sudo -i ?  I don't dare close that terminal until I know I can lay my eyeballs on the commands I just ran again
press up on the arrow keys
that's while I'm IN the terminal.  What about after?  Are they going to be in ~/.bash_history or somewhere else?
-- run "history" like Pumpkin- said, works well on my distro :)
